1: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <sup>2320 </sup> <n>month</n> הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <sup>7637 </sup> <n>Now it came to pass in the seventh</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>with him came</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>[that] Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָ֣ה <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֱלִישָׁמָ֣ע <sup>476 </sup> <n>of Elishama</n> מִזֶּ֣רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>of the seed</n> הַ֠מְּלוּכָה <sup>4410 </sup> <n>royal</n> וְרַבֵּ֨י <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and the princes</n> הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king</n> וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <sup>6235 </sup> <n>even ten</n> אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> אִתּ֛וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <sup>1436 </sup> <n>unto Gedaliah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֲחִיקָ֖ם <sup>296 </sup> <n>of Ahikam</n> הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>to Mizpah</n> וַיֹּ֨אכְלוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and there they did eat</n> שָׁ֥ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> לֶ֛חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> יַחְדָּ֖ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> בַּמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <sup>4709 </sup> <n>Mizpah</n>
2: וַיָּקָם֩ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Then arose</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָ֜ה <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <sup>6235 </sup> <n>and the ten</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים ׀ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הָי֣וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אִתּ֗וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וַ֠יַּכּוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>that were with him and smote</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּדַלְיָ֨הוּ <sup>1436 </sup> <n>Gedaliah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֲחִיקָ֧ם <sup>296 </sup> <n>of Ahikam</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> שָׁפָ֛ן <sup>8227 </sup> <n>of Shaphan</n> בַּחֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with the sword</n> וַיָּ֣מֶת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and slew</n> אֹת֑וֹ <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הִפְקִ֥יד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>had made governor</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>him whom the king</n> בָּבֶ֖ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>over the land</n>
3: וְאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַיְּהוּדִ֗ים <sup>3064 </sup> <n>all the Jews</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הָי֨וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אִתּ֤וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>1436 </sup> <n>that were with him [even] with Gedaliah</n> בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>at Mizpah</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֖ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>and the Chaldeans</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> נִמְצְאוּ־ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>that were found</n> שָׁ֑ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אֵ֚ת <sup>853 </sup> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>582 </sup> <n>there [and] the men</n> הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> הִכָּ֖ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>also slew</n> יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <sup>3458 </sup> <n>Ishmael</n>
4: וַיְהִ֛י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> בַּיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>day</n> הַשֵּׁנִ֖י <sup>8145 </sup> <n>And it came to pass the second</n> לְהָמִ֣ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>after he had slain</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּדַלְיָ֑הוּ <sup>1436 </sup> <n>Gedaliah</n> וְאִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and no man</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָדָֽע׃ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>knew</n>
5: וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>That there came</n> אֲ֠נָשִׁים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> מִשְּׁכֶ֞ם <sup>7927 </sup> <n>from Shechem</n> מִשִּׁל֤וֹ <sup>7887 </sup> <n>from Shiloh</n> וּמִשֹּֽׁמְרוֹן֙ <sup>8111 </sup> <n>and from Samaria</n> שְׁמֹנִ֣ים <sup>8084 </sup> <n>[even] fourscore</n> אִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> מְגֻלְּחֵ֥י <sup>1548 </sup> <n>shaven</n> זָקָ֛ן <sup>2206 </sup> <n>having their beards</n> וּקְרֻעֵ֥י <sup>7167 </sup> <n>rent</n> בְגָדִ֖ים <sup>899 </sup> <n>and their clothes</n> וּמִתְגֹּֽדְדִ֑ים <sup>1413 </sup> <n>and having cut</n> וּמִנְחָ֤ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>themselves with offerings</n> וּלְבוֹנָה֙ <sup>3828 </sup> <n>and incense</n> בְּיָדָ֔ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in their hand</n> לְהָבִ֖יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>to bring</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>[them] to the house</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
6: וַ֠יֵּצֵא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went forth</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>And Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָ֤ה <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> לִקְרָאתָם֙ <sup>7125 </sup> <n>to meet</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>from Mizpah</n> הֹלֵ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>all along</n> הָלֹ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>as he went</n> וּבֹכֶ֑ה <sup>1058 </sup> <n>them weeping</n> וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּפְגֹ֣שׁ <sup>6298 </sup> <n>and it came to pass as he met</n> אֹתָ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>them he said</n> אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בֹּ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>unto them Come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <sup>1436 </sup> <n>to Gedaliah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֲחִיקָֽם׃ <sup>296 </sup> <n>of Ahikam</n> ס
7: וַיְהִ֕י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>turned</n> כְּבוֹאָ֖ם <sup>935 </sup> <n>And it was [so] when they came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> תּ֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>into the midst</n> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֞ם <sup>7819 </sup> <n>slew</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֤אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>that Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָה֙ <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> תּ֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>them [and cast them] into the midst</n> הַבּ֔וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>of the pit</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>and the men</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אִתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>But</n>
8: וַעֲשָׂרָ֨ה <sup>6235 </sup> <n>But ten</n> אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> נִמְצְאוּ־ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>were found</n> בָ֗ם וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>among them that said</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <sup>3458 </sup> <n>unto Ishmael</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תְּמִתֵ֔נוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>Slay</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יֶשׁ־ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>us not for we have</n> לָ֤נוּ מַטְמֹנִים֙ <sup>4301 </sup> <n>treasures</n> בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> חִטִּ֥ים <sup>2406 </sup> <n>of wheat</n> וּשְׂעֹרִ֖ים <sup>8184 </sup> <n>and of barley</n> וְשֶׁ֣מֶן <sup>8081 </sup> <n>and of oil</n> וּדְבָ֑שׁ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>and of honey</n> וַיֶּחְדַּ֕ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>So he forbare</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הֱמִיתָ֖ם <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and slew</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>them not among</n> אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>their brethren</n>
9: וְהַבּ֗וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>Now the pit</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הִשְׁלִ֨יךְ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>had cast</n> שָׁ֤ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> יִשְׁמָעֵאל֙ <sup>3458 </sup> <n>wherein Ishmael</n> אֵ֣ת ׀ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> פִּגְרֵ֣י <sup>6297 </sup> <n>all the dead bodies</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>of the men</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הִכָּה֙ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>whom he had slain</n> בְּיַד־ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>because</n> גְּדַלְיָ֔הוּ <sup>1436 </sup> <n>of Gedaliah</n> ה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> עָשָׂה֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>had made</n> הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> אָסָ֔א <sup>609 </sup> <n>[was] it which Asa</n> מִפְּנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>for fear</n> בַּעְשָׁ֣א <sup>1201 </sup> <n>of Baasha</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֹת֗וֹ <sup>853 </sup> מִלֵּ֛א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>filled</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֥אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>[and] Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָ֖הוּ <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> חֲלָלִֽים׃ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>it with [them that were] slain</n>
10: וַיִּ֣שְׁבְּ ׀ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>carried away captive</n> יִ֠שְׁמָעֵאל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>Then Ishmael</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> שְׁאֵרִ֨ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>all the residue</n> הָעָ֜ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בַּמִּצְפָּ֗ה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>that [were] in Mizpah</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנ֤וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughters</n> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>[even] the king's</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and all the people</n> הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <sup>7604 </sup> <n>that remained</n> בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>in Mizpah</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הִפְקִ֗יד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>had committed</n> נְבֽוּזַרְאֲדָן֙ <sup>5018 </sup> <n>whom Nebuzaradan</n> רַב־ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>the captain</n> טַבָּחִ֔ים <sup>2876 </sup> <n>of the guard</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <sup>1436 </sup> <n>to Gedaliah</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֲחִיקָ֑ם <sup>296 </sup> <n>of Ahikam</n> וַיִּשְׁבֵּם֙ <sup>7617 </sup> <n>carried them away captive</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>and Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָ֔ה <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and proceeded</n> לַעֲבֹ֖ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>to go over</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the sons</n> עַמּֽוֹן׃ <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> ס
11: וַיִּשְׁמַע֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>that [were] with him heard</n> יוֹחָנָ֣ן <sup>3110 </sup> <n>But when Johanan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> קָרֵ֔חַ <sup>7143 </sup> <n>of Kareah</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> שָׂרֵ֥י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and all the captains</n> הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <sup>2428 </sup> <n>of the forces</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אִתּ֑וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֤ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הָֽרָעָה֙ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>of all the evil</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>had done</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>that Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָֽה׃ <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n>
12: וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Then they took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>to fight</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>with Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָ֑ה <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> וַיִּמְצְא֣וּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and found</n> אֹת֔וֹ <sup>853 </sup> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> מַ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> רַבִּ֖ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>him by the great</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>is in</n> בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <sup>1391 </sup> <n>that [are] in Gibeon</n>
13: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּרְא֤וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Now it came to pass [that] when all the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>were with</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>which [were] with Ishmael</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יֽוֹחָנָן֙ <sup>3110 </sup> <n>Johanan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> קָרֵ֔חַ <sup>7143 </sup> <n>of Kareah</n> וְאֵ֛ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> שָׂרֵ֥י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and all the captains</n> הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <sup>2428 </sup> <n>of the forces</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אִתּ֑וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> וַיִּשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>that [were] with him then they were glad</n>
14: וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>cast about</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>So all the people</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> שָׁבָ֥ה <sup>7617 </sup> <n>had carried away captive</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>that Ishmael</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>from Mizpah</n> וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and returned</n> וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>unto</n> יֽוֹחָנָ֖ן <sup>3110 </sup> <n>unto Johanan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> קָרֵֽחַ׃ <sup>7143 </sup> <n>of Kareah</n>
15: וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>But Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָ֗ה <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> נִמְלַט֙ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>escaped</n> בִּשְׁמֹנָ֣ה <sup>8083 </sup> <n>with eight</n> אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> מִפְּנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from</n> יֽוֹחָנָ֑ן <sup>3110 </sup> <n>Johanan</n> וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and went</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the sons</n> עַמּֽוֹן׃ <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> ס
16: וַיִּקַּח֩ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Then took</n> יוֹחָנָ֨ן <sup>3110 </sup> <n>Johanan</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> קָרֵ֜חַ <sup>7143 </sup> <n>of Kareah</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> שָׂרֵ֧י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and all the captains</n> הַחֲיָלִ֣ים <sup>2428 </sup> <n>of the forces</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> אִתּ֗וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> שְׁאֵרִ֤ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>that [were] with him all the remnant</n> הָעָם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הֵ֠שִׁיב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>whom he had recovered</n> מֵאֵ֨ת <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׁמָעֵ֤אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>from Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָה֙ <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַמִּצְפָּ֔ה <sup>4709 </sup> <n>from Mizpah</n> אַחַ֣ר <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> הִכָּ֔ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>[that] he had slain</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּדַלְיָ֖ה <sup>1436 </sup> <n>Gedaliah</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֲחִיקָ֑ם <sup>296 </sup> <n>of Ahikam</n> גְּבָרִ֞ים <sup>1397 </sup> <n>[even] mighty</n> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> וְנָשִׁ֤ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>and the women</n> וְטַף֙ <sup>2945 </sup> <n>and the children</n> וְסָ֣רִסִ֔ים <sup>5631 </sup> <n>and the eunuchs</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הֵשִׁ֖יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>whom he had brought again</n> מִגִּבְעֽוֹן׃ <sup>1391 </sup> <n>from Gibeon</n>
17: וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> וַיֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and dwelt in</n> בְּגֵר֣וּת <sup>1628 </sup> <n>the habitation</n> [כְמֹוהֶם כ] (כִּמְהָ֔ם ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אֵ֖צֶל <sup>681 </sup> <n>which is by</n> בֵּ֣ית לָ֑חֶם <sup>1035 </sup> <n>Bethlehem</n> לָלֶ֖כֶת <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> לָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>to enter</n> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>into Egypt</n>
18: מִפְּנֵי֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>Because</n> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>of the Chaldeans</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>since</n> יָרְא֖וּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>for they were afraid</n> מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>accept</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>since</n> הִכָּ֞ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>had slain</n> יִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <sup>3458 </sup> <n>of them because Ishmael</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נְתַנְיָ֗ה <sup>5418 </sup> <n>of Nethaniah</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <sup>1436 </sup> <n>Gedaliah</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> אֲחִיקָ֔ם <sup>296 </sup> <n>of Ahikam</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הִפְקִ֥יד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>made governor</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>whom the king</n> בָּבֶ֖ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> ס
